# Broom of Flying
## Overview
**Aura** moderate transmutation; **CL** 9th

**Slot** â€”

**Price** 17,000 gp

**Weight** 3 lbs.

**Description**

This broom is able to fly through the air as if affected by an *[[Overland Flight (Spell)|overland flight]]* spell (+4 on [[Fly (Skill)|Fly]] skill checks) for up to 9 hours per day (split up as its owner desires). The broom can carry 200 pounds and fly at a speed of 40 feet, or up to 400 pounds at a speed at 30 feet. In addition, the broom can travel alone to any destination named by the owner as long as she has a good idea of the location and layout of that destination. It flies to its owner from as far away as 300 yards when she speaks the command word. The *broom of flying* has a speed of 40 feet when it has no rider.

**Construction**

**Requirements** [[Craft Wondrous Item (Feat)|Craft Wondrous Item]], *[[Overland Flight (Spell)|overland flight]], [[Permanency (Spell)|permanency]]*

**Cost** 8,500 gp

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 505
